books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: As the government hit man Will Robie and his partner, Jessica Reel, prepare for a mission, they face a new adversary.
books.name: THE TARGET

books.author: by Greg Iles
books.description: Penn Cage, a former prosecutor in Natchez, Miss., delves into the secrets of his father, a doctor who has been accused of murdering an African-American nurse.
books.name: NATCHEZ BURNING

books.author: by Donna Tartt
books.description: A painting smuggled out of the Metropolitan Museum of Art after a bombing becomes a boy’s prize, guilt and burden.
books.name: THE GOLDFINCH

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman disappears on the day of her fifth anniversary; is her husband a killer?
books.name: GONE GIRL

books.author: by Nora Roberts
books.description: A freelance writer who may have witnessed a murder-suicide joins the dead man’s brother to learn what happened.
books.name: THE COLLECTOR

books.author: by Susan Mallery
books.description: In Fool’s Gold, Calif., Angel Whittaker, a bodyguard trainer, meets his match in Taryn Crawford, a tough-talking public relations executive.
books.name: WHEN WE MET

books.author: by Jasinda Wilder
books.description: A desperate woman learns that her mysterious benefactor demands something in return.
books.name: ALPHA

books.author: by Iris Johansen
books.description: The C.I.A. operative Catherine Ling must spearhead the rescue of an American journalist kidnapped in Tibet.
books.name: LIVE TO SEE TOMORROW

books.author: by Jay Crownover
books.description: Sparks fly between a nurse and a chastened bad boy; a Marked Men novel.
books.name: NASH

books.author: by Christina Baker Kline
books.description: A historical novel about orphans swept off the streets of New York and sent to the Midwest in the 1920s.
books.name: ORPHAN TRAIN

books.author: by Gena Showalter
books.description: An Angels of the Dark tale featuring the winged warrior Thane and Elin Vale, the rescued slave who becomes his obsession.
books.name: BURNING DAWN

books.author: by Bella Andre, Barbara Freethy and others
books.name: A SWEET LIFE

books.author: by Liane Moriarty
books.description: A woman’s life is upended when she discovers a letter from her husband she was not meant to read.
books.name: THE HUSBAND'S SECRET

books.author: by Stephanie Laurens
books.description: Violet Matcham and Montague — London’s “most experienced man-of-business” — race to expose a cunning and cold-blooded killer; a Casebook of Barnaby Adair novel.
books.name: THE MASTERFUL MR. MONTAGUE

books.author: by James Patterson and Marshall Karp
books.description: Zach Jordan and his partner are called when the body of a wealthy woman is discovered in Central Park.
books.name: NYPD RED 2
